website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor lovers had better prepare for what awaits them in the Ontario 85 Mid Waterproof. Indeed, wearing one paves the way for hikes where great agility and high amounts of comfort are almost always assured. In it, wearers can also expect to experience the trail with exemplary traction and water protection.That said, this high-quality hiking boot might put off some customers with its inefficient closure system. Nonetheless, the Ontario 85 Mid Waterproof is an outstanding Merrell piece, thanks to its collection of hike-focused pros.
pros: According to practically everyone who has rated the Merrell Ontario 85 Mid Waterproof highly, the footgear is incredibly comfortable
Many purchasers find an extremely lightweight hiking boot in this offering
The Ontario 85 Mid Waterproof has a remarkably grippy outsole, based on several reports
This boot-type hiking piece from Merrell is fantastic in terms of waterproofing, say about a handful of those who have purchased it
Someone who has been hiking for a long time loves the Ontario 85 Mid Waterproof’s short break-in period
cons: Based on a review, the boot’s lacing system is a bit tricky to configure
Case in point: When the top portion is tightened, the bottom part loosens
An owner with narrow feet is not amused by the shoe’s attached tongue
She said it has too much excess fabric which gives a poking sensation around the instep

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new boots this afternoon. They fit as expected, but now thinking, I may have considered a half-size larger when wanting to wear a thicker sock, which I normally do. Great comfort and ease-of-use (putting on, tying). True Merrell quality as expected, especially with someone like me who now owns 7-8 different pairs of Merrell shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MuddyInIndy

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic boots as long as you aren't an idiot like me
customer_reviews.text: It is very cold today. I went home to walk my dogs at lunch as I usually do, and thought it would be smart to wear these as there is a fair amount of snow on the ground and the high temperature is only expected to reach 19f. They were great on the walk. My feet stayed warm and dry. I made the mistake of not changing back into my other shoes before going back to work and now my feet are overly warm.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The lightest, toughest hiker
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Ontario 85 boots Ive purchased in the last 3 years. My first pair are still going strong but I was worried they might be discontinued. Ive hiked hard trails from the east to west coast for over 40 years and these are by far the best for strength and weight ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D. Hitchner

customer_reviews.title: solid shoe, i needed 1/2 bigger
customer_reviews.text: these shoes looked and felt great. but they were just a little too small for my liking. I wear a 11.5 the shoe was just to tight where I thought my foot would start hurting before they stretched out a little. I decided to but the 12 and they fit amazing. They are surprisingly light but feel were durable. I am also glad I got the bigger size because how low light these boots are, I am guessing I will need some thick socks for the cold winter hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Gizynski

customer_reviews.title: Great price, a little wide. Better than low tops.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far,.. I bought the high top and the low top. I like the high tops a little more than the low-top Ontario 85s. The highs/mids seem to be a little better made than the low. There are some features the high tops have that the low tops don’t have. Both are a touch wider than I expected, but both are still very comfortable. I got them for about half retail, so a great price in my book.
customer_reviews.author: HotMamaShida

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, too expensive, not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these fit my small, wide feet. However, they are not waterproof. Maybe a splash of water could be thwarted..... but I walked through wet grass and got completely soaked through. We’ll see about the workmanship quality (seems ok for now) and maybe I’ll come back and edit this review. I have generally low expectations for pretty much all newly produced items.
customer_reviews.author: I love reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really write a full review other than I like these much better in person. They fit my husband as expected and he loves them. I would say that’s a successful buy and we would recommend these to others looking for a comfortable hiking boot!
customer_reviews.author: @fivefreespirits

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and ready to go
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable from the first time you put them. They don’t even need to be broken in. They seem to be very durable but they could be a little more breathable. They’re great for most hiking except maybe high temps and desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. From fishing, hiking, bushcrafting, these boots have gone through it all. They stay dry and warm in the winter and aren’t overbearingly hot in the summer. Dip into the water without sacrificing your socks.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Nice walking mid boot
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight and require no break in. Have a few miles on mine and so far so good. Comfortable and well made. Not sure on water proof yet. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Product Picture for "Gold" Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Obviously the picture for the Gold color shows a child shoe. I can confirm a received the right Merrill boot. They fit slightly small/narrow but with an added SuperFeet insole they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dolliver

customer_reviews.title: Comfy classy light
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to test waterproof but everything else is great. Very light and comfortable and good support. Also has a great retro look.
customer_reviews.author: ksp

customer_reviews.title: Great Hikers!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and super light weight! Does not feel like you're wearing a boot. I had a minor issue and the customer service I received from the seller was stellar! Highly recommend this boot and this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Erock

customer_reviews.title: light foot
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sneakers , light & comfortable . they arrive today and I was expecting to get it next week Thanks
customer_reviews.author: BERT

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable, lots of support on the foot and ankle. Great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight boot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Really comfortable. Would definitely recommend. Have not tested waterproof yet. Very warm with a boot sock
customer_reviews.author: The Kilcoynes personal

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This a great hiking boot , size is right on , They seem to breathe very well for a waterproof boot. The have a running shoe feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Wet Cold and Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Like wet cold feet? Then say hello to the Ontario 85. Extra socks not included.
customer_reviews.author: Charcer

customer_reviews.title: Dependability
customer_reviews.text: I’m a roofing contractor and I’ve been searching for the right style boot for years Finally I came across Merrell this is my Second purchase and I can’t be more thrilled they are lightweight very grippy and definitely the most comfortable boot I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my son for his annual cross country road trip- hiking and camping. He texted me after a hike in the Rockies and the first thing he said was “the boots you got me are amazing!!”
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, Is Merrell BACK?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, very light weight shoe. So far they're holding up just fine. Maybe I just might give Merrell one more chance to win me as a customer again. Bc Salomon had me but now their shoes are absolutely terrible from what they were.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and he loves them. Comfortable and fun looking!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lordy them some good boots
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable footwear. Have been wearing nothing but Merrills for 10 years now
customer_reviews.author: philip jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Did not have to break them in and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very lightweight comfortable boot for hiking or around town
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIECHI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot!
customer_reviews.text: Hiked for 9 hours in Washington rain & mud. Feet were bone dry at the end. Super comfortable and I was carrying a 60lbs pack. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Amarillas

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for hiking or around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot fits and wears well. Sometimes I honestly wear then just for fun around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality.....look good and very versatile for daily use along with outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOTS, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had them for a few days, but so far so good!!!! Very light weight, super comfortable, very well made
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW KAUTHER

customer_reviews.title: I ordered half number big fit's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable looks good on jeans all day use
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Very comfortable with no breaking in needed.
customer_reviews.author: melissa dennison

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a gift to my husband and they fit him just great! He has commented several times about how much he loves them and how comfortable they are. He also likes that they are not heavy boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Shoe bigger/wider than last pair of ontario85's I just purchased - bought this pair because first felt incredible and I wanted to have a second pair. These are OK, same size, just different color. Wet grass went right through and my feet were wet in about 2 minutes. still pretty comfortable - I maybe will not buy the 68.00 ones and stick to the 100+ prices shoes - were these knock offs? grey/blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: accent laces ?
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and absolutely love them. But I didnt get my pair of accent laces ! Arent they talking about a 2nd pair of laces in the description ??
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Ontario 85 Mid Leisure Time and Sportwear Boots
product_meta.description: Boots Men Merrell ontario 85 Mid J16929
